subject: minimal build
commitMessage:
minimal build

Disable most backends by default. Building tests depends on telepathy
and is not needed, so disable it always.

This commit uses bcond_with to disable the features by default.

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

This is a proposal for configuring the reduced build. I think the consensus is to use feature checks (as I do here), but I am not sure about the names of the specific checks.

Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

(2 comments)
Uploaded patch set 2.
Patch Set 2: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 2: Verified+1 Code-Review+2

Lacking other maintainers, let me go ahead and approve the change.
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

subject: folks-uninstalled.pc.in: does not depend on telepathy
commitMessage:
folks-uninstalled.pc.in: does not depend on telepathy

The dependency on telepathy-glib is wrong (does not show up in
installed version either) and causes build failures when compiling
without telepathy.

comments.message: Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
